item.title: Senate takes key vote toward ending government shutdown
item.description: The deal that split Democrats doesn’t extend expiring ACA subsidies. If a bill passes the Senate, it needs the House to approve and President Donald T...

item.title: Flight cancellations ‘only going to get worse,’ transportation secretary says
item.description: More than 2,700 flights were canceled and over 10,000 delayed, making Sunday the worst day for travel disruptions since the shutdown began.

item.title: Trump administration orders states to pause paying full SNAP benefits
item.description: As the shutdown dragged on, USDA demanded that states “immediately undo” any steps they have taken to send full November payments to SNAP recipients.

item.title: Ten seconds in the Oval Office that overshadowed Trump’s drug-price win
item.description: A press conference collapse has sparked days of memes and jokes. Not all are accurate.

item.title: Ranking the 2028 Republican presidential contenders
item.description: Most of the contenders here are among Trump’s closest allies, but a non-MAGA candidate could bubble up.
